com.example.colibris.ui

Class WifiDirectCalibrationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.example.colibris.ui.WifiDirectCalibrationFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, FileListener, SleepListener

    public class WifiDirectCalibrationFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
implements FileListener, SleepListener
    This fragment handles the UI used to display information about the calibration. this includes a list view user for the messages that are exchanged during the calibration. All the protocol is implemented here

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WifiDirectCalibrationFragment.CalibrationMessageAdapter
      ArrayAdapter to manage the messages that are displayed in different colors depending on how the message start (blue if the message start with - , red if it begin by warning ect...
      static interface  WifiDirectCalibrationFragment.MessageTarget
      interface dertermining the target
